item.description: Elastic Load balancer (ELB) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking #loadbalancer Loadbalancer service provided by AWS Elastic Load Balancing supports the following types of load balancers: Application Load Balancers, Network Load Balancers, and Classic Load Balancers.
Transit Gateway #aws #cloud #networking #vpc Simply like a powerful virtual Router like service by AWS. AWS Transit Gateway connects your VPC and on-premises networks through a central hub.

VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a commercial cloud computing service that provides users a virtual private cloud, by “provisioning a logically isolated section of AWS Cloud”.
